values.Akadi: {%moralneutral+2}{%ethicalneutral+2}{$goddescr=, Goddess of air, movement and speed. (True Neutral)}
values.Chauntea: {%good+2}{%ethicalneutral+2}{$goddescr=, Goddess of agriculture, farmers, gardeners and summer. (Neutral Good)}
values.Grumbar: {%moralneutral+2}{%ethicalneutral+2}{$goddescr=, God of earth, solidity, changelessness, oaths. (True Neutral)}
values.Istishia: {%moralneutral+2}{%ethicalneutral+2}{$goddescr=, God of water, purification, wetness. (True Neutral)}
values.Kelemvor: {%moralneutral+2}{%lawful+2}{$goddescr=, God of death and the dead. (Lawful Neutral)}
values.Kossuth: {%moralneutral+2}{%ethicalneutral+2}{$goddescr=, God of fire, purification through fire. (True Neutral)}
values.Lathander: {%good+2}{%ethicalneutral+2}{$goddescr=, God of spring, dawn, birth, youth, vitality, athletics. (Neutral Good)}
values.Mystra: {%good+2}{%ethicalneutral+2}{$goddescr=, Goddess of magic, spells, the Weave. (Neutral Good)}
values.Oghma: {%moralneutral+2}{%ethicalneutral+2}{$goddescr=, God of knowledge, invention, inspiration, bards. (True Neutral)}
values.Selune: {%good+2}{%ethicalneutral+2}{$goddescr=, Goddess of the moon, stars, navigation, prophecy, questers, lycanthropes. (Neutral Good)}
values.Silvanus: {%moralneutral+2}{%ethicalneutral+2}{$goddescr=, God of wild nature, druids. (True Neutral)}
values.Sune: {%chaotic+2}{%good+2}{$goddescr=, Goddess of beauty, love, passion. (Chaotic Good)}
values.Tempus: {%moralneutral+2}{%chaotic+2}{$goddescr=, God of war, battle, warriors. (Chaotic Neutral)}
values.Torm: {%lawful+2}{%good+2}{$goddescr=, God of duty, loyalty, obedience, paladins. (Lawful Good)}
values.Ubtao: {%moralneutral+2}{%ethicalneutral+2}{$goddescr=, God of creation, jungles, Chult, the Chultans, dinosaurs. (True Neutral)}
